title: Meneses (Aires de Saldanha de Sousa)
body: On November 9, 1668, he was appointed Governor and Captain-General of Madeira, and took office on April 10, 1669. Years later, he became Governor and Captain-General of Angola.

1668: Appointment as Governor and Captain-General of Madeira
1669: Assumption of the office of Governor and Captain-General of Madeira
